OCC.DAT: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Verdana;}} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\tx420\tx840\tx1260\tx1680\tx2100\tx2520\tx2940\tx3360\tx3780\tx4200\tx4620\tx5040\tx5460\tx5880\tx6300\tx6720\tx7140\tx7560\tx7980\tx8400\tx8820\tx9240\tx9660\tx10080\tx10500\tx10920\tx11340\tx11760\tx12180\tx12600\tx13020\tx13440\f0\fs17 GOTO / Reports / Product Master\par Form to launch batch related to Product.\par \par Code list SMM_SPRD0100_BA2\par code list is the same as form name.\par \par examples to get info\par -------------------------------------------------------\par UNIFACE REPORT\tab SMM_SPRD0100_PL3\par GP \tab\tab\tab SMM_INVSTAT\par Service \tab\tab SMM_SINV1305_001\par --------------------------------------------------------\par \par Params rtp Product Forecast Report (PDF)\par -------------\par "PARLIST=\par \{?Customer\}=1112070800\'b7!\'b7;\par \{?CustomerID\}=ALL\'b7!\'b7;\par \{?EmployeeID\}=ALL\'b7!\'b7;\par \{?Company\}=MITCHEL\'b7!\'b7;\par \{?Branch\}=ALL\'b7!\'b7;\par \{?NoZero\}=Yes\'b7!\'b7;\par \{?SortBy\}=1\'b7!\'b7;\par \{?ReportTitle\}=Product Forecast Report (PDF)"\par \par \par Params rtp MinMaxProduct2\par -------------\par \{?CSGrp\}=ALL\par \{?CustomerID\}=1610008002\par \{?EmployeeID\}=ALL\par \{?SortBy\}=1\par -------------\par \par CHANGES\par \par PATCH#\tab WHO \tab\tab \tab\tab TECH REF #\tab\tab\tab WHEN \tab\tab\tab\tab WHAT \par --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\par \tab\tab Daric Martin \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab 28/06/2017 \tab\tab Added Distribution to product item report., CL: 7,PRODUCTFORECAST,Product Forecast Report (PDF), removed option for old product Forecast out of the execute drop down.\par \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab \tab\tab Added a second option for product forecast report in drop down list, ( Product Forecast Report with distribution (PDF) )\par --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\par \tab\tab Daric Martin \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab 07/07/2017 \tab\tab Added Distribution to MinMaxProduct2 report., add the distribution calculation from productforcast2.rtp to MinMaxProduct2.rtp\par \tab\tab\tab \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab \tab\tab Added a second option for MinMaxProduct2 report in drop-down list MTO Product Min/Max Report with distribution (PDF).\par \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab What is new in MinMaxProduct2?\par \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab 1. Calculation of quantity distribution added in the amounts.\par \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab 2. New field and new narrative CSG Customer Service Grouping. To add a CSG narrative, Use the CAD, MBF Maintenance. \par \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab 3. The amount distributed is subtracted from the amount available. Avail = (QtyOnHand - QtyRelease - QtyDistrabution)\par \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab 4. Orders that are distributed are marked Distb. If the order is not a distribution order nothing will be displayed.\par \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab email subject = Doit \'eatre test\'e9 en LIVE., changements au rapport MinMaxProduct, Testing In LIVE.\par --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\par pJMb001\tab Jean Michel Boulet\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab 2018 August 30\tab\tab When New Inventory, choice "Product Forecast Report" must NOT be available (field operation.BUTTONS_1)\par --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\par pPma002\tab Pierre Malboeuf\tab\tab PKG_1645_20201113\tab 2020 Nov 13\tab\tab\tab Ajouter le nom du client dans le sujet du courriel rapport d'inventaire des rouleaux\par --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\par pJMb003\tab Jean Michel Boulet\tab\tab PKG_1352_005\tab\tab 2021 February 02\tab\tab Add Company as a parameter for Crystal report 2016 version of MinMaxProduct2Scan.rpt and MinMaxProductScan.rpt (Error -150 at execution)\par --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\par pPma004\tab Pierre Malboeuf\tab\tab PKG_1352_028\tab\tab 2021 Sept 27\tab\tab\tab Modifier les composantes batch et qui retourne les messages d'erreur de facon interactive\par --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\par pJMb005\tab Jean Michel Boulet\tab\tab PKG_1789\tab\tab\tab 2021 October 07\tab\tab Add checkbox "Prod. With activity only" as a filter when executing "Inventory and order status with release report"\par \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab Add quantitytoship to qtyonhand in Crystal Report ProductStatusRelScan.rpt\par \tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab\tab Add salesorder customer description when salesorder linked to a distribution product (in Crystal Report ProductStatusRelScan.rpt\par --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\par \par }

variables string UTL_CONTEXT1 ; Context variable 1 string UTL_CONTEXT2 ; Context variable 2 string UTL_DBNAVLIST ; See constant string UTL_DLUPENTLST ; See constant string UTL_ENTSTATUS ; Std trigger string UTL_INPUT string UTL_MNUDISABLE ; Disable menu options string UTL_MODE string UTL_OUTPUT string UTL_PENDACT ; Pending action string UTL_TPL ; See constant string UTL_TPLVER ; See constant string UTL_TRGSTATUS ; Std trigger string UTL_WRUPENTLST ; See constant endvariables #define BreakInheritance_cpt_INIT #define BreakInheritance_cpt_GENERAL #Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_references #ifdefined TEMPLATENAME #info symbol TEMPLATENAME is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define TEMPLATENAME=UTL_FORM_BAX #Comment
#Comment end_of_references
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_mappings #ifdefined UENTITY #info symbol UENTITY is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UENTITY=SPRD0100.SMM #Comment
#ifdefined UNQ_UENTITY #info symbol UNQ_UENTITY is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UNQ_UENTITY=SPRD0100 #Comment
#Comment end_of_mappings
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_symbols #Comment end_of_symbols
#Comment ----------------------------------------------

operation exec ;AUTHOR : Georges Moiny, Compuware Montreal ;DESC : ;CREATED: 20/05/1999 ;============================= MOD HISTORY ============================== ;TAG DATE DESCRIPTION ;======================================================================== params $utl_mode$ :IN $utl_input$ :IN $utl_output$ :OUT endparams if(!$$udk_batch) call LP_BEFEXEC call LP_BEFEDIT edit call LP_AFTEDIT call LP_AFTEXEC else putmess "==> %%$datim START %%$componentname - %%$$bat_jobno" call LP_BEFEXEC clear/e "EXEQUEUE" jobno.EXEQUEUE/init=$$bat_jobno retrieve/e "EXEQUEUE" if($status=0) call X_MESSAGE("IC_BATJOBFND") $$acr_userid=userid.EXEQUEUE activate "UTL_GNRLTOOL".INITPRM($$acr_userid) getlistitems/occ/init input.EXEQUEUE,"<UENTITY>" ;pJMb001 START NEW CODE if ($$SMM_NEWINVSTAT) if (operation.EXEQUEUE == "SMM_SPRD0100_PL3") call X_MESSAGE("IC_BATSTARTOP") ;Action obsolète. Utiliser l'option «Gestion des chargements» dans le menu «Bons de production». putmess "==> %%$datim%%% %%$componentname%%% - $$bat_jobno%%%, %%operation.EXEQUEUE%%% - %%$text(DEPRVANLOAD_L)%%%" call X_MESSAGE("IC_BATENDOP") return (0) endif ;if (operation.EXEQUEUE == "SMM_SPRD0100_PL3") endif ;if ($$SMM_NEWINVSTAT) ;pJMb001 END NEW CODE operation.BUTTONS_1=operation.EXEQUEUE call X_MESSAGE("IC_BATSTARTOP") call LP_STARTHIST if($status=0) call LP_EXECOP call LP_ENDHIST($status) endif call X_MESSAGE("IC_BATENDOP") else putmess "==> %%$datim %%$componentname - %%$$bat_jobno not found" endif call LP_AFTEXEC store/e "TASKMESS" commit putmess "==> %%$datim END %%$componentname - %%$$bat_jobno" return endif done
entry LP_STARTHIST jobno.TASKHIST=$$bat_jobno retrieve/e "TASKHIST" taskno.TASKHIST=taskno.EXEQUEUE component.TASKHIST=component.EXEQUEUE operation.TASKHIST=operation.EXEQUEUE userid.TASKHIST=userid.EXEQUEUE startdt.TASKHIST=$datim setocc "TASKHIST" store/e "TASKHIST" if($status<0) call X_ONERRORDBIO("STORE",$status,"") rollback return -1 else commit return 0 endif
entry LP_ENDHIST params numeric numStatus :IN endparams enddt.TASKHIST=$datim opstatus.TASKHIST=numStatus setocc "TASKHIST" store/e "TASKHIST" if($status<0) call X_ONERRORDBIO("STORE",$status,"") rollback return -1 else commit return 0 endif
entry LP_EXECOP variables string strInst string strEntity, strCS, strCSList, strPr, strName, strDest, strTemp, strLogon string strSortOrder, strPar, strOption, strOutPath, strValue, strHeader numeric numIndex boolean b_prospect string strPdfFile, strServer, strSubject, strBody, strEmail, strMsg, strReportName string strCustomerName ;pPma002 numeric numResult endvariables
customer.sprd0100=party.sopf1090 if (S_PRODSTAT.sprd0100 != '3') vrprdstatus.sprd0100=S_PRODSTAT.sprd0100 else vrprdstatus.sprd0100="" endif
strSortOrder=sort_order.sprd0100 if (operation.buttons_1 = "SMM_SPRD0100_257") b_prospect=b_zero.sprd0100 else b_prospect=p_prospect.sprd0100 endif
;SMM_CR00359 (Add begin) if (operation.BUTTONS_1 = "PRODUCTLIST") if ($$smm_customerid !="") putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","%%$$smm_customerid%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","ALL" endif if ($$smm_employeeid !="") putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","%%$$smm_employeeid%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","ALL" endif putitem/id strPar,"{?Company}","%%$$smm_company%%%" if (branch.SPAR0020!="") putitem/id strPar,"{?Branch}","%%branch.SPAR0020%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?Branch}","%%$$smm_branch%%%" endif if (party.SOPF1090!="") putitem/id strPar,"{?Customer}","%%party.SOPF1090%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?Customer}","ALL" endif putitem/id strPar,"{?ProductStatus}","%%s_prodstat.SPRD0100%%%" putitem/id strPar,"{?SortBy}","%%sort_order.SPRD0100%%%" if (b_prospect) putitem/id strPar,"{?WithProspect}","Yes" else putitem/id strPar,"{?WithProspect}","No" endif putitem/id strOption,"PARLIST",strPar putitem/id strOption,"MODE","SCREEN" call G_CRVIEWER("ProductList.rpt",strOption) return endif ;SMM_CR00359 (Add end)
;SMM_CR00360 (Add begin) if (operation.BUTTONS_1 = "PRODUCTSTATUS") if ($$SMM_NEWINVSTAT) strReportName="ProductStatusScan.rpt" else strReportName="ProductStatus.rpt" endif
if ($$smm_customerid !="") putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","%%$$smm_customerid%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","ALL" endif if ($$smm_employeeid !="") putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","%%$$smm_employeeid%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","ALL" endif putitem/id strPar,"{?Company}","%%$$smm_company%%%" if (party.SOPF1090!="") putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerNo}","%%party.SOPF1090%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerNo}","ALL" endif
activate "UTL_GNRLTOOL".CL_L("SMM","SMM_SPRD0100_BA2",$$SMM_LANGUAGE,operation.BUTTONS_1,strValue) putitem/id strPar,"{?ReportTitle}","%%strValue%%%" putitem/id strOption,"PARLIST",strPar
;PMA20140330 (Change begin) ;strOutPath=$logical("smm_tempdir") ;putitem/id strOption,"MODE","PDF" ;putitem/id strOption,"DESTINATION","%%strOutPath%%%productstatus.pdf" ;call G_CRVIEWER("ProductStatus.rpt",strOption) ;if ($status=0) ; call SMM_CRTOPDF("","",strOutPath,"productstatus","") ;endif ;(New Code) if ($$udk_batch) if (emailaddr.SPRD0100 != "") strPdfFile=$logical("smm_tempdir") if (party.SOPF1090!="") strPdfFile="%%strPdfFile%%%\ProductStatus_%%party.SOPF1090%%%.pdf" else strPdfFile="%%strPdfFile%%%\ProductStatus_%%vrsalesmgroup.SPRD0100%%%.pdf" endif ;PMA20130107 (Change end)
lfiledelete "%%strPdfFile%%%" putitem/id strOption,"MODE","PDF" putitem/id strOption,"DESTINATION",strPdfFile putitem/id strOption,"PARLIST",strPar call G_CRVIEWER(strReportName,strOption)
;pPma004 (Change begin) ;if ($status<0 & $lfileexists(strPdfFile) = 1) ; message/error "Error %%$status%%% on trying to send the document." ; return 0 ;(New Code) if ($status<0) putmess "Error %%$status%%% trying to generate the document." return -1 ;pPma004 (Change end) endif sleep 1000
numResult=0 strServer=$logical("smm_mailserver") strSubject="Rapport inventaire / Inventory status report" strBody="Rapport inventaire / Inventory status report" strEmail=emailfrom.SPRD0100
;PMA20160613 - Move to UPOPMAIL and new exchange server 2008 ;activate "SMEG".Send(numResult,strServer,strEmail,emailaddr.SPRD0100,strSubject,strBody,strPdfFile) ;if ($status<0) ; message/error $text(EC_MAILERR) ; return -1 ;endif ;(New Code) ;if (emailintf.SPRD0100="UPOPMAIL")
;PMA20190725 (Change begin) - Modifier le texte du courriel pour notification Do not reply ;strBody="%%strBody%%%%%^%%^%%strEmail%%%" strMsg="Ne pas répondre à ce courriel. Pour répondre veuillez utiliser l’adresse ci-dessous. %%^Please do not respond to this email. To reply use the address below." strBody="%%strBody%%% %%^ %%^%%strMsg%%% %%^%%strEmail%%%" ;PMA20190725 (Change end)
activate "ACR_USR_GS1".GetFieldVal("USERID=%%$$acr_userid%%%",strTemp) getitem/id strEmail, strTemp, "EMAIL" call X_SENDMAIL(emailaddr.SPRD0100,strEmail,"",strSubject,strBody,"",strPdfFile) putmess "Email from: %%strEmail%%%, Email to: %%emailaddr.SPRD0100%%%, strBody: %%strBody%%% status: %%$status%%%" if ($status<0) ;pPma004 (Change begin) ;message/error $text(EC_MAILERR) call X_MESSAGE("EC_MAILERR") ;pPma004 (Change end) return -1 endif ;endif ;PMA20160613 - End return
endif else strOutPath=$logical("smm_tempdir") putitem/id strOption,"MODE","PDF" putitem/id strOption,"DESTINATION","%%strOutPath%%%productstatus.pdf" call G_CRVIEWER(strReportName,strOption) if ($status=0) call SMM_CRTOPDF("","",strOutPath,"productstatus","") endif endif ;PMA20140330 (Change end) ;SMM_CR00360 (Add end) return endif
;SMM_CR00195 (Add begin) if (operation.BUTTONS_1 = "PRODUCTFORECAST") if ($$SMM_NEWINVSTAT) strReportName="ProductForecastScan.rpt" else strReportName="ProductForecast.rpt" endif
putitem/id strPar,"{?Customer}","%%party.SOPF1090%%%" if ($$smm_customerid !="") putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","%%$$smm_customerid%%%" putitem/id strPar,"{?Customer}","%%$$smm_customerid%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","ALL" endif if ($$smm_employeeid !="") putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","%%$$smm_employeeid%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","ALL" endif putitem/id strPar,"{?Company}","%%$$smm_company%%%" if (branch.SPAR0020!="") putitem/id strPar,"{?Branch}","%%branch.SPAR0020%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?Branch}","ALL" endif
if (b_zero.sprd0100) putitem/id strPar,"{?NoZero}","Yes" else putitem/id strPar,"{?NoZero}","No" endif
putitem/id strPar,"{?SortBy}","%%sort_order.SPRD0100%%%" activate "UTL_GNRLTOOL".CL_L("SMM","SMM_SPRD0100_BA2","USA",operation.BUTTONS_1,strValue)
if ($$SMM_NEWINVSTAT) strValue="%%strValue%%% (Scan)" endif
putitem/id strPar,"{?ReportTitle}","%%strValue%%%" putitem/id strOption,"PARLIST",strPar
if ($$udk_batch) if (emailaddr.SPRD0100 != "") strPdfFile=$logical("smm_tempdir") strPdfFile="%%strPdfFile%%%\productforecast_%%party.SOPF1090%%%.pdf" lfiledelete "%%strPdfFile%%%" putitem/id strOption,"MODE","PDF" putitem/id strOption,"DESTINATION",strPdfFile putitem/id strOption,"PARLIST",strPar ;call G_CRVIEWER("ProductForecast.rpt",strOption) call G_CRVIEWER(strReportName,strOption) ;pPma004 (Change begin) ;if ($status<0 & $lfileexists(strPdfFile) = 1) ; message/error "Error %%$status%%% on trying to send the document." ; return 0 ;(New Code) if ($status<0) putmess "Error %%$status%%% trying to generate the document." return -1 ;pPma004 (Change end) endif
sleep 1000
numResult=0 strServer=$logical("smm_mailserver") strSubject="Rapport Inventaire" strBody="Rapport Inventaire" strEmail=emailfrom.SPRD0100

putitem/id strPar,"{?Customer}","%%party.SOPF1090%%%" if ($$smm_customerid !="") putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","%%$$smm_customerid%%%" putitem/id strPar,"{?Customer}","%%$$smm_customerid%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","ALL" endif if ($$smm_employeeid !="") putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","%%$$smm_employeeid%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","ALL" endif putitem/id strPar,"{?Company}","%%$$smm_company%%%" if (branch.SPAR0020!="") putitem/id strPar,"{?Branch}","%%branch.SPAR0020%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?Branch}","ALL" endif

strName="{?CSGrp}" strValue=vrsalesmgroup.SPRD0100 call X_REPLSUBSTR(strValue,";","&uSEP;") call LP_SETPARAM(strName,strValue,strPar)
;PMA2015116 Fix parm - init to ALL if left blank if (vrsalesmgroup.SPRD0100="") putitem/id strPar,"{?CSGrp}","ALL" endif
if ($$smm_customerid !="") putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","%%$$smm_customerid%%%" else if (party.SOPF1090!="") putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","%%party.SOPF1090%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?CustomerID}","ALL" endif endif
if ($$smm_employeeid !="") putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","%%$$smm_employeeid%%%" else if (salesman.SPRD0100!="") putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","%%salesman.SPRD0100%%%" else putitem/id strPar,"{?EmployeeID}","ALL" endif endif

;pJMb003 START NEW CODE if (owncompany.SPRD0100!="") putitem/id strPar,"{?Company}",owncompany.SPRD0100 else putitem/id strPar,"{?Company}",$$smm_company endif ;pJMb003 END NEW CODE
if ($$udk_batch) putitem/id strOption,"PARLIST",strPar activate "SMM_GNRLTOOL".GetDefault($$smm_company,$$smm_branch,"MINMAXPRT",strPr)
if (emailaddr.SPRD0100 != "") strPdfFile=$logical("smm_tempdir")

Pour répondre veuillez utiliser l’adresse ci-dessous. %%^Please do not respond to this email. strInst="" ;SMMMIG_00033 newinstance operation.BUTTONS_1,strInst,"TRANSACTION=TRUE" if($procerror) call X_ONERRORGEN("",$procerror,$procerrorcontext) return -1 endif
putlistitems/occ strEntity,"SPRD0100" activate strInst.EXEC(strEntity,strSortOrder,b_prospect,p_revision) if($procerror) call X_ONERRORGEN("",$procerror,$procerrorcontext) return -1 endif call X_MESSAGE("IC_JOBFINISHED") return
;SMM_CR00447-A (Add begin) entry LP_SETPARAM params string strParName :IN string strParList :IN string strPar :INOUT endparams variables numeric numIndex string strValue, strOut endvariables
numIndex=1 getitem strValue,strParList,numIndex while($status>0) if (strOut="") strOut = "%%strParName%%%=%%strValue" else strOut = "%%strOut%%%&uSEP;%%strParName%%%=%%strValue" endif numIndex=1+numIndex getitem strValue,strParList,numIndex endwhile if (strPar!="") strPar = "%%strPar%%%&uSEP;%%strOut%%%" else strPar = strOut endif done ;SMM_CR00447-A (Add end)
entry LP_GETCSGRPBR params string strCsGrp :IN string strCsGrpBr :OUT endparams variables string strUserId, strTemp endvariables
if (strCsGrp="") return
strUserId = "" strTemp = "SELECT DISTINCT paramvalue FROM usrparam WHERE paramname IN ('SMM_CUSTSRVGRP') and paramvalue = '%%strCsGrp%%%'" sql strTemp,"DEF" if ($result!="") strUserId = $result strUserId = "%%strUserId%%%" endif
if (strUserId="") strUserId=strCsGrp endif
strTemp = "SELECT DISTINCT paramvalue FROM usrparam WHERE paramname IN ('SMM_BRANCH') and paramvalue = '%%strUserId%%%'" sql strTemp,"DEF" if ($result!="") strCsGrpBr = $result strCsGrpBr = "%%strCsGrpBr%%%" endif
End
entry LP_BEFEXEC putitem/id $valrep(s_prodstat.SPRD0100),"1",$text(active_s) putitem/id $valrep(s_prodstat.SPRD0100),"2",$text(inactive_s) putitem/id $valrep(s_prodstat.SPRD0100),"3",$text(all_s)
putitem/id $valrep(sort_order.SPRD0100),"1",$text(descr_s) putitem/id $valrep(sort_order.SPRD0100),"2",$text(product_s) putitem/id $valrep(sort_order.SPRD0100),"3",$text(sizes_s) done
entry LP_AFTEXEC done

operation EXEREAD if($entname="SPRD0100") if($$smm_employeeid!="") read where "customer in (select party from sopf1090 where employee='%%$$smm_employeeid%%%')" $result=-1 else if($$smm_customerid!="") read where "customer='%%$$smm_customerid%%%' or customer in (select customerchild from spar3005 where customerpar='%%$$smm_customerid%%%')" $result=-1 endif endif endif end

;SMM_CR00447 (Change begin) ;;SMM_CR00414 (Add begin) ;if($status=0) ; if(@$fieldname="SMM_SPRD0100_256") ; field_syntax salesman.SPRD0100,"" ; else ; field_syntax salesman.SPRD0100,"HID" ; endif ;endif ;;SMM_CR00414 (Add end) ;(New Code) if($status=0) if(@$fieldname="SMM_SPRD0100_256") ;pJMb001 field_syntax salesman.SPRD0100,"" fieldsyntax salesman.SPRD0100,"" ;pJMb001 ;pJMb001 field_syntax vrsalesmgroup.SPRD0100,"HID" fieldsyntax vrsalesmgroup.SPRD0100,"HID" ;pJMb001 fieldsyntax b_prodactonly.SPRD0100, "HID" ;pJMb005 ;PMA20130725 (Change begin) ;elseif(@$fieldname="MINMAXPRODUCT") elseif(@$fieldname="MINMAXPRODUCT" | @$fieldname="ROLLSINVSTCS" | @$fieldname="PRODUCTSTATUSREL") ;PMA20130725 (Change end) ;pJMb001 field_syntax salesman.SPRD0100,"" fieldsyntax salesman.SPRD0100,"" ;pJMb001 ;pJMb001 field_syntax vrsalesmgroup.SPRD0100,"" fieldsyntax vrsalesmgroup.SPRD0100,"" ;pJMb001 ;PMA20110524 (Add begin) ;pJMb001 field_syntax emailaddr.SPRD0100,"" fieldsyntax emailaddr.SPRD0100,"" ;pJMb001 ;PMA20110524 (Add end) ;pJMb005 START NEW CODE if (@$fieldname == "PRODUCTSTATUSREL") fieldsyntax b_prodactonly.SPRD0100, "" endif ;if (@$fieldname="PRODUCTSTATUSREL") ;pJMb005 END NEW CODE else ;pJMb001 field_syntax salesman.SPRD0100,"HID" fieldsyntax salesman.SPRD0100,"HID" ;pJMb001 ;pJMb001 field_syntax vrsalesmgroup.SPRD0100,"HID" fieldsyntax vrsalesmgroup.SPRD0100,"HID" ;pJMb001 ;PMA20110524 (Add begin) ;pJMb001 field_syntax emailaddr.SPRD0100,"HID" fieldsyntax emailaddr.SPRD0100,"HID" ;pJMb001 ;PMA20110524 (Add end) fieldsyntax b_prodactonly.SPRD0100, "HID" ;pJMb005 endif endif ;SMM_CR00447 (Change begin)
trigger validate call X_UTL_DDCL("VF")

trigger getFocus call X_FLDGF
